column1: Appendix table 18: Number of sentenced prisoners in federal prison, by most serious offense, 2000, 2008, and 2009
Authors: Heather C. West, Ph.D., William J. Sabol, Ph.D., and Sarah J. Greenman
Appendix table 18. Number of sentenced prisoners in federal prison, by most serious offense, 2000, 2008, and 2009
Note: Based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. All data are for September 30 from the BJS Federal Justice Statistics Program.
a/Includes murder, negligent, and non-negligent manslaughter.
